title: how many hours do i have
body: Can i check how many hours i have???  I think i should have had the 1500 hr emote

replies.body: I don't actually have that data on hand myself, but if you'd like you can hit up our agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can check to make sure you got the right one!

Check out wol.gg for the answer.

Edit: This is only the time spent in ranked games.

Which isn't very useful for everyone. According to that, I've played 117 hours, or about 5 days. I probably spent about that long playing Snowdown ARURF for the 2 weeks it was up. I've played well over 2000 ARAM games, and love to play side modes. I don't exactly know how many Summoner's Rift games I've played, or how many 3v3's I've done, or even how many Dominion games I've played while it lasted, but that was all a long time ago.

On that note, I have the 1500 hours reward emote, so I guess I haven't played enough to obtain the 2500 hours emote, but that sounds about right to me. Most of my games have play times between 1000-2000 hours (about 7 or 8 different games), with a single game being over 6000 hours played with minimal afk time (RuneScape auto logs off after 5 mins of afk). It's crazy to think how long I've spent online playing games, but hey... I'm like a year away from my 15 year cape on RuneScape, to give you an idea of how many years these hours have been spent over.

> [{quoted}](name=Kokua,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=j0LhFs9A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T10:47:47.568+0000)

Most of my games have play times between 1000-2000 hours (about 7 or 8 different games), with a single game being over 6000 hours played with minimal afk time (RuneScape auto logs off after 5 mins of afk). It's crazy to think how long I've spent online playing games, but hey... I'm like a year away from my 15 year cape on RuneScape, to give you an idea of how many years these hours have been spent over.

Yeah it's only the time you've spent in ranked games.
